line: I just realized that I’m scheduled to speak at that fundraiser on our date night. I can cancel.

name: Morty
line: We’ll be together. That’s a date.

name: Jacquelyn
line: You are the perfect man.  Oh, sweetie,  I think you hit the wrong button. You didn’t hang up.

name: Morty
line: Huh. How ‘bout that?

name: Rick
line: Sorry, tiny American Psycho,  time to take the opposite of your medicine.

name: Morty
line: Do what you got to do.

name: Morty
line: Oh! Ow! Ahh!

name: Jessica
line: So, how do you feel, Morty?

name: Morty
line: Ah, geez. I’m miserable.

name: Rick
line: Am I good or what?

name: Morty
line: I guess it’s worth it, though, to know how much you care.

name: Jessica
line: Care? Me? Morty, I’m fine with you. I only did this for him.

name: Rick
line: You lying bitch. She kept coming to our house, Morty, and kept asking me. "Did did d-did you get a new Morty yet?"

name: Jessica
line: Because you kept drunk dialing me and crying about it.

name: Rick
line: I wasn’t crying!

name: Morty
line: Jacquelyn, I I-I-I wasn’t who I said I was.

name: Jacquelyn
line: You weren’t a 14-year-old boy from the Midwest who ran away from his family and capitalized on his lack of conscience by becoming a stock broker?

name: Morty
line: Oh. I guess I was pretty up front about that, wasn’t I?

name: Jacquelyn
line: You were up front about everything. You were my soul mate.

name: Morty
line: Well No-Not anymore. I’ll, um Y-You can keep the apartment, and and and, uh the drones.

name: Rick
line: She can’t keep the drones. They turn into a little Voltron robot. They’re awesome.

name: Rick
line: You can’t keep the drones.

name: Girl 1
line: So, how was your date with Brad?

name: Jessica
line: It wasn’t a date. We were just having lunch.

name: Girl 2
line: You guys are getting back together, aren’t you?

name: Rick
line: Morty, I need your help on an adventure. Eh, "need" is a strong word. We need door stops, but a brick would work, too.

name: Morty
line: Okay.

name: Jessica
line: Morty.

name: Jessica
line: Good to have you back.

name: Girl 1
line: Have you ever been peed on before? Oh, my God. Yum.

name: Credits song
line: Hey, did you ever want to hold a terrifold? I got one right here Grab my terri-flap Squeeze it Grab it, squeeze it Tug on my terri-flap Hey, I want to take you to The terrifold dance Wanna come with me? You can grab my holdie-folds Squeeze ‘em tight You son of a bitch. Suck my holdie-flappy folds Lick my flappy foldie-holes My terri-flaps in your mouth Suck my flaps, you piece of shit. Whoo!

name: Man
line: Although only a handful of moon towers remain today, they were popular in the late 19th century. An entire town could be illuminated by...  What the hell is this?

name: Stacey
line: Sea Cucumber! Sea Cucumber!!
